landing.title: Upload DXF. Get instant quote. Launch laser cutting in minutes.
landing.subtitle: Cuttim is a production service where clients upload drawings, select material and quantity, pay online, then track fabrication and delivery while managers process files and ship finished parts.

upload.title: Upload
upload.description: Client uploads a DXF drawing and we extract geometry metadata.

quote.title: Quote
quote.description: Choose material and quantity. System calculates cutting and shipping cost.

pay.title: Pay
pay.description: Client confirms order and pays securely through YooKassa.

production.title: Produce
production.description: Manager downloads file, runs laser machine, checks quality and packs.

delivery.title: Deliver
delivery.description: Tracking number is assigned and order status is updated in cabinet.
